tools.name: render-website-screenshot
tools.description: Capture and return a website screenshot as an image using the provided URL, enabling visual context from web pages for enhanced AI interactions.
tools.instructions: Render a screenshot of a website and returns it as an image.
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "url": { "description": "URL of the website to screenshot", "format": "uri", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "url" ], "type": "object" }
